title: lib/model: Progress emitter runs way too often

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Every few microseconds:

```

[SYNO4] 2016/08/16 19:40:35.304077 progressemitter.go:63: DEBUG: progress emitter: timer - looking after 0
[SYNO4] 2016/08/16 19:40:35.304089 progressemitter.go:103: DEBUG: progress emitter: emitting map[string]map[string]*model.pullerProgress{}
```

I have this in my config, for a reason I don't know:

`<progressUpdateIntervalS>0</progressUpdateIntervalS>`

Possibly a migration gone wrong somewhere along the way, since this is my production config that's been live since like v0.10 or something. Nonetheless, we should set a lower bound and handle this better.
